item.title: How to Manage Environment Variables
item.description: In many projects that i have been working I want to manage GLOBAL’s variables, so to do that use direnv. to install (MacOS): brew install direnv Now the project needs to create a file .envrc like this: # Stripe Credentials export STRIPE_PRIVATE_KEY="xxxxxxxxxxxx" export STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET="xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx" entering in that directory direnv asks to allow the execution and use of that variables, so: direnv allow . And that’s it! you don’t need a custom solution for every programming language.
